mapper.select: select b.*, m.member_nickname from (select a.*, (select sum(recommend) from tip_recommend where tip_no = a.tip_no) recommend_cnt from tip a ) b,tip t, member m where t.member_no = m.member_no order by recommend_cnt desc limit 0,4

select t.*,m.member_nickname from tip t, member m where t.member_no = m.member_no
and (t.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or t.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or t.member_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and t.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and t.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and t.member_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%')
and (t.title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') or t.content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%'))
and t.category_code in (1, 2, 3, 4)
and t.category_code = 1
and t.category_code = 2
and t.category_code = 3
and t.category_code = 4
order by tip_no desc limit #{begin}, #{pageNum}

select count(*) from tip
where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or member_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
where content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
where member_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%')
where title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%')
and category_code = 1 or 2 or 3 or 4
and category_code = 1
and category_code = 2
and category_code = 3
and category_code = 4

select a.*, (select count(*) from tip_comment_recommend where recommend = 1 and comment_no = a.comment_no) - (select count(*) from tip_comment_recommend where recommend = -1 and comment_no = a.comment_no) as recommendCnt, (select recommend from tip_comment_recommend where comment_no = a.comment_no and member_no=#{memberNo}) as recommend from tip_comment a where a.tip_no=#{tipNo} order by a.comment_no desc
